## IHttpErrorSerializer.serializeResponse property

Serializes an HttpError into a client-safe error response. This method strips sensitive information and returns a standardized format suitable for API responses.

**Signature:**

```typescript
serializeResponse: (error: HttpError) => ErrorResponse<unknown>;
```

## Example


```typescript
const serializer = new HttpErrorSerializer();
const clientResponse = serializer.serializeResponse(httpError);
res.status(500).json(clientResponse);
```
